data.message:
Dear Facebook.
Today I wanted to share a music in my profile. Facebook sent me notice (immediately) that I violate copyrights,and better for me to delete it. I deleted. So why now my access to sharing video and live videos are blocked? I followed the notice that you sent.
Better to ignore that notices and share videos,because however i will be blocked for week or more?

replies.message: Hey Тото. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2htIiE7. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2z3xwzR. -Elizabeth
That ban goes 1 week. No matter I accepted your notice to delete,or regretted it and posted the video. I checked this for 2 times.
facebook is stupid, everyone shares music i dont get what the problem was...
